channel.title: Dragon Claws
channel.description:
I tried adding dragon claws to my server, for the most part it worked. Except, it only hit's twice, and It gives me a skeleton hand under my character, and when i equip it.
Tut I Used: I couldn't find one on here for a Delta.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/133005-delta-best-dragon-claws-code-client-server.html

item.title: Dragon Claws
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

Is all the model IDS correct and for the special attack that’s server side so i can talk about that. For the GFX and the animation and the item make sure the Models are correct and are being used on the server
